signUp:Title: Create account
signUp:SocialLogin: or use your social account for log in:
pwSetup:PasswordError: Password must be at least 8 characters long. Password must contain at least one lowercase character, one uppercase character and one non-alphanumeric character.

pwSetup:Description: Please choose a password for your account:

emailCheck:Description: We have sent you a 4 digit code to the following email address:

retailersId:Title: Retailer’s ID

home:Bubble3: Get discount coupons in exchange for your recycled items

recyclingBin:CollectProducts: Collect products for your virtual recycling bin
